reviews.comments: The house was the nicest in the surrounding area and exactly matched the listing. I loved the stay so much. During our stay the host was extreme responsive and actively supportive. The location was excellent close to some of the  largest supermarkets and restaurants. Will definitely stay here next time. Thank you so much for a wonderful stay.

Tam is very kind and a great host. The rooms were great and the little pool was nice too. We even rented a couple of scooters from our host which made life easy. Would recommend this place, it was a very good base.
Location, location, location. Itâ€™s all it is. Nice view to the water and the fireworks. Everything is at a walking distance. 2 separate studios with all you need. Modern and clean. I would go back.

The villa was absolutely beautiful, my friends and I loved the place. The neighborhood was a bit quiet but safe and easy to find. It is located around 15-20 minute drive from the main tourist area of Phu Quoc and around 30-40 mins from Sunset Town. The host was also very responsive and helped us out with activities in the city and recommendations around the area. Will definitely come again!

The house was perfect and the pool was great. My kids loved the pool.
The owner Thien was so helpful, he helped order a massage therapist to come to the house and helped order food. I will definitely come back to this place the next time Iâ€™ll visit Phu Quoc.

We had an absolutely wonderful stay at this Airbnb in Phu Quoc! From the moment we arrived, everything was just perfect. The apartment was clean, modern, and well-equipped with all the amenities needed for a comfortable stay. The interiors were thoughtfully designed and created a cozy, homely atmosphere.
But the true highlight of our stay was the beautiful. It was the perfect spot to unwind and cool off after a day of exploring the island. Our family spent hours there every dayâ€”whether it was enjoying a morning dip, relaxing in the afternoon sun, or taking a peaceful evening swim. It added so much value to our vacation experience.
The location was also greatâ€”quiet and peaceful, yet close enough to reach local markets, restaurants, and beaches with ease. The host was extremely responsive and helpful, offering recommendations and ensuring we had a smooth and enjoyable stay.
Highly recommend this property to anyone visiting Phu Quoc.

Absolutely Stunning!
This villa exceeded all expectationsâ€”it looks even better in person than in the photos! Every detail was perfect, from the beautiful decor to the immaculate cleanliness. The space was spacious, luxurious, and well-equipped with everything we needed. Highly recommend this villa for an unforgettable stay!

Scored points with my family for booking this Airbnb. My family simply love it! We feel right at home and the place is clean and well maintained. AC is powerful and there's hot water showers/ bath.  Added bonus to be able to do our laundry ( washing powder provided) and dinnerware provided are top of the line. villa is close to cheap and good restaurants. James ( our host) is very responsive to our queries and provided us a variety of food to order from ( You can also do Grabfood). Highly recommended for folks travelling to Phu Quoc with young kids.

Great place, all like on photo. All things in great condition. A pool was great. An internet was great and super suitable for work. Also host can rent you a motorbike for good price.
But there was a building site just behind the walls and workers starts at 7 AM. Very loudly, even through ear plugs, we can't sleep. Host told that it only for one day, but it was every 7 days. He lied. Everything else were great.
Overall 9 / 10.

Great little villa, 10-15 min walk to the main street where you can pick up some fruits or breakfast. Used their airport transfer so check in was very smooth even with our delayed flight. Communication was very prompt, villa comes with a water filter system which was very helpful and also lots of pool towels! Would recommend
We enjoyed our stay at the villa. It was everything we expected and much more! Iâ€™d definitely recommend this place for anyone looking for a pleasant stay
Beautiful villa - clean, well equipped, everything you need was nearby and yet it was quiet all day long. We enjoyed our entire stay.

The villa is very good.
James helped with transportation to the attractions, he was very nice and helpful. The children had a lot of fun in the private swimming pool. It is a very pleasant trip for us.

I absolutely love this spot! It's nestled in such a special location right by the beach, yet conveniently close to town with its charming locals and eateries. Strolling down the streets, popping into restaurants, and chatting with the local vendors is such a delight. Despite all the hustle and bustle, this place manages to remain peaceful and secluded. Let me tell you, it exceeded all my expectations based on what was described on Airbnb. Everything is so fresh and stylish here.

Had a great time at the apartment! The stay was very comfortable, and the location is perfect, within walking distance to cafes, restaurants, and shops. One of the highlights was the amazing view of the fireworks right from the balcony. I would definitely stay here again. The staff were also incredibly helpful and responsive, always ready to assist with anything or offer great recommendations.

The staff were super welcoming and helpful from the moment we arrived. Our room was clean and thoughtfully designed with a local touch. Highly recommend Su Casa if youâ€™re looking for a private but close to the beach accommodation. Would definitely come back!
Very quiet and nice place. The room has everything you need including a microwave. Staff are very friendly and provide the buggy to the nearest beach. Easy checkin and checkout.

Love it here.  The young women who take care of us are all caring, capable and helpful.  Very walkable, peaceful and beautiful place.  The beaches are long and the sand is soft, the water in the Gulf of Thailand is clear and warm.   Was surprised to see so many empty buildingsâ€¦and also look for ward to a more environmental, green approach to vacationing.  Would like to see the garbage problem addressed as well.
Staff were so nice, clear instructions and the place considered new. Will be great place to stay after the area completely developed. Peaceful is the word that can describe the place.

I like this place. If I will come back to Phu Quoc I stay here for sure. Thank you for creating such cozy place. The pillows were so comfortable! Thank you for my best sleep â¤ï¸ Also you can use baggy car here, it is very comfortable service. Thank you for everything! We enjoyed!

Nice apartment in a pretty new building complex which is not yet fully at life (so rather quiet around). We rented bicycles at the reception to get around (5 min to beach) - would recommend that, if you want to explore the closer surroundings, e.g. the night market for dinner.
Laundry machine is included, but bring your own washing powder. Overall it is very good value for money.

This part of Phu Quoc is quiet and close to the west coast beach (but the beaches on the west coast are not swimmable due to the strong tides so if youâ€™re looking at being close to a beach where you can swim in, itâ€™s on the east coast/south). Thereâ€™s a beach club: Saling Club, near this accoms if you want the view of the beach while being in a pool.
But in terms of peaceful and quiet location, this is it,â€”itâ€™s close to a stretch with food/marts/laundry shop just 5mins ride away.
This place is about 15-20mins ride further up north to the more central part of Phu Quoc where all the shops are. We really like this location cos itâ€™s away from the hustle of the central area and the roads here are a lot quieter too.
In terms of cleanliness, everything is perfect except that a cockroach crawled out from under the curtain on the first night (which we killed). But other than that, everything matches the description and is very neat.

Title: Comfortable and Clean, but Slightly Remote
Overall, my stay at Su Casa Phu Quoc Long Beach was pleasant. The hotel is clean, the rooms are comfortable, and the overall experience was positive.
Pros:
â€¢ Smooth check-in process with friendly and helpful staff.
â€¢ High cleanliness standards, making the stay comfortable and worry-free.
â€¢ Well-equipped facilities, offering good value for money.
Cons:
â€¢ The location is a bit remote, so transportation is needed to reach major attractions.
â€¢ While the check-in process was smooth, there is still room for improvement.
If youâ€™re looking for a quiet and clean place to stay, this is a solid choice!

The place was super clean and brand new. I've had my 2-night vacation stay here, and the staff were very friendly and gentle. I'd definitely stay here once again next time. Love this place! ;)

It was one of the best stays in my AirBnb history. The apartment was perfect - clean, cozy and spacious. Everything looked brand new. The host was super proactive and the hospitality staff was the friendliest Iâ€™ve ever seen - very helpful and mindful. Location is not far from the beach but quite far from the most attractions on the island - youâ€™d need a scooter that you can rent from Su Casa (which was also almost brand new as well). In summary - one of the best stays ever. Thanks!
Great location and room! It is however a really quiet town, and not much to do around.
Had an amazing stay on Su Casa Long Beach. Very quite and peaceful place..!!
Will be a really good spot once Phu Quoc becomes more busy and full of shops... Walking distance to the beach and rentals galore makes this a worthwhile stay.

Stylish hotel in a quiet area
The hotel is located in the Marina area, with a wonderful beach and a small night market with outdoor cafes within a ten-minute walk (there are sidewalks and very little traffic on the roads). The area is being built up, there are very few people, so you can enjoy peace and relaxation. The hotel is stylish and minimalistic. Even in a small room, the kitchen area has been thought out, which has all the necessary utensils. High-quality furniture and pretty clean. A comfortable shower room and good supplies (shampoo, shower gel). The staff is friendly, always ready to help (they helped us get rid of a large bug that flew into the room)). Excellent new bikes can be rented at the hotel, and when booking for seven days or more, a transfer is provided in a comfortable car, which is very useful after a long flight.
Lived with family for 5 weeks, great place. Quiet, has everything you need, great and friendly staff. Not far from the sea and a small night market. Highly recommend

This accommodation is new, modern, very clean, good amenities, and a very friendly staff. The location can be a drawback because itâ€™s far from the old part of town where the night market is and most of the tours leave from. If you donâ€™t mind being out by yourself with not much close by you will like this place. Itâ€™s very quiet. A little caution is be sure you are booking a one bedroom if that is what you desire. The picture is of a one bedroom unit but when I got there I was in a studio. I asked them and they said that was what I booked. I was looking at the pictures they advertised for the unit and assumed that was what I booked. It was confusing to me. Just pay attention when you book.
I can recommend this place mostly because of the helpful staff. Again, if you want quiet this would be a good choice.

it is such a beautiful place, luxe rooms, anesthetic setup, peaceful location, convenient to move around, and the best is the staff and the service, always ready to help and assist. we would surely recommend and come back to you.

This is exactly what I was looking for: a beachfront cottage, great location, clean, and comfortable bed.  On top of that, a great host, very helpful and went above and beyondâ€”he bought me a fruit knife when I asked for one and provided additional water and snacks. I booked for a week and ended up staying an additional three days as I enjoyed the beautiful surroundings and the beach with lots of personal space and privacy so much. It allows you a sense of peaceful mindset. This place is very affordable and a bargain for what it offers. Thank you, Khan, for being such a wonderful host, making my holiday in Phu Quoc a very memorable one. I will definitely come back!

We had a great stay at Khan's bungalow. While the bungalow did feel a little dated and old, it is comfortable, clean and has everything needed for a convenient stay. We liked having a kettle and Khan left us some teabags, coffee and little snacks which were a nice touch. The bungalow is on a very beautiful beach and it felt special to wake up to such an incredible view and to be able to watch the sunset from the bungalow. Kind cleaning staff clean the bungalow every day if you want them to. We especially liked that the wifi was very strong and stable and suited to online working. There were no power issues while we were there, even when nearby areas away from the beach were experiencing powercuts. We would stay again for sure. Thank you Khan for your kindness and for being so helpful and friendly!

Wir haben die knappe Woche in unserem Bungalow sehr genossen. Die Lage, die Umgebung und die Aussicht waren grossartig. Der Strand ist sehr schÃ¶n und sauber. Zu Fuss sind einige Restaurants erreichbar. Mit dem Roller ist man schnell und sicher an verschiedenen Orten auf der Insel.

Das Bungalow ist gerÃ¤umig und mit allem Notwendigen ausgestattet. Zu erwÃ¤hnen ist, dass das Bett ziemlich hart war. Ansonsten haben wie uns rundum wohl gefÃ¼hlt. Wir wÃ¼rden jederzeit wieder kommen! Vielen Dank fÃ¼r diesen schÃ¶nen Aufenthalt.
Wir hatten tolle drei Tage in der Unterkunft und waren begeistert von der grandiosen Lage direkt am Strand mit Blick auf das Meer. Sehr zu empfehlen!

Perfect corner unit very private faces directly in front of the light show and fireworks. 3 min walk to cable car and Kiss of the Sea. 4 min walk to convince store open 24 hours. New apartment with all facilities. Great sea view. We stayed for 2 days and still missing it.. you can enjoy the fireworks from the apartment. We will definitely visit again.

We've spent an entire week in this beautiful, private place and I can honestly say, that this was the best Airbnb we've stayed in.
The house is beautiful, the kitchen clean, the garden is lush and green and the sand at the private beach just perfect.
I'm already planning my next trip to stay here, so if you're hesitating on renting this place - just do it!

We lived here for 6 months with a 4yo kid. The house is super practical: two bedrooms, fully equipped kitchen, TV with Netflix, a great collection of English books, terrace with sofa and a big table (which we later moved inside for late-night laptop work).
You get your own garden and total privacy, just steps from a small private beach.
Next door is Kikiâ€™s, run by Jamieâ€”a warm-hearted guy with food, beers, games, and paddleboards to borrow.
Important: you need a scooter, walking isnâ€™t really an option. But if you have one and want a peaceful, private placeâ€”this is it.
Hoang is an amazing host. She arranged a taxi, sent me money when I bought some additional kitchen gear, and speaks English (rare in Phu Quoc). Truly helpful and kind.
Cleaning once a week was another big plus.
Highly recommend. Donâ€™t think twice.

Hoangâ€™s place is very serene. Quiet, private, away from the busy parts of the island. If youâ€™re looking for some R&R with a great sea view, this is the place to be.

the place is very private . you will need a bike or car to get around
next door there is a small resort that you can get meals. the owner is english and is very helpfull .
there is internet WiFi at the place which is very good
you can swim there but you have to go put a long way .
there is some rubbish on the beach area as this is a major problemall along ALL the beaches in Phu Quoc which is a shame .It is minimum there but tide brings it in .
you need to get provisions in if you eat in regularly and nearest mart is fair away .

We stayed at Hoangâ€™s house for a month and really felt like at home!
The place has everything you need for comfortable living. The area is far from all the hustle and bustle, thatâ€™s we really like about that location. There only one minus was that the sea at winter time as not so good at this east part of the island. But if you have a bike, then itâ€™s only 30 min drive to the good beaches and the island city center.
Also we are very grateful to Hoang for her hospitality and quick response. She helped us a lot with different moments.
I think this house is a really perfect option for that money, if you wanna live in peaceful area. Highly recommend!

This house is an amazing find and was great for our family of four.  The house itself is comfortable and well equipped - all the appliances and utensils needed to cook for yourself if you want.  The outdoor seating area is nice. There are mosquitos but they weren't that bad and the host provided mosquito coils. The beach and the chairs in the shade overlooking it are lovely. The water is shallow and often quite calm so good for kids. Trash washes up with the tide but sadly that is the same every where.  The location is secluded and we didn't have motorbikes given the young kids but the kind and super responsive host was great about hooking us up with taxis when we needed them.  There is also a casual and friendly beach hotel next door (Kiki Coconut) which you can reach in a minute by beach or road - it became an extension of the airbnb given how many meals we had at their beach restaurant.  Beautiful location, lovely host, comfortable house, great neighbors - I hope we can return!

Het is een mooi huisje aan zee voor 4 personen met een goede douche, fan en airo in alle kamers, smart tv met netflix, goede keuken, fijne zitgelegenheid buiten het huisje en aan zee, uitzicht op zee, grote tuin, waslijn, prive strandje, rustige buurt - geen last van de buren. En er zijn niet veel muggen.
Nadeel is wel dat het nogal afgelegen ligt, het kost ruim een half uur om in hoofdstad Duong Dong te komen. En zwemmen vanaf het prive strand is niet aantrekkelijk door de harde wind.

The house is quiet and private.
The contact with Hoang was warm and very responsive.
Very good stay,
My partner and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay here, beach is right on your doorstep and the area in general is so peaceful and calm. We loved our time here â˜ºï¸

Die Sterne sind in Relation zum Ã¶rtlichen Standard gesehen. Es handelt sich schlieÃŸlich um eine Insel mit Regenwald und subtropischem Klima. Das scheinen manche Touristen bei ihren Bewertungen zu vergessen.
Perfekter Ort, um abzuschalten, wenn man einen etwas abgelegenen und ruhigen Ort sucht. Hoang war zwar nicht vor Ort, hat aber ihre Mitarbeiter/Bekannten vor Ort.
Nebenan ist das Kiki Coconut Beach Resort, das von Jamie, einem EnglÃ¤nder, betrieben wird. Hier gibt es neben lokalen SpezialitÃ¤ten auch westliches Essen auf der Karte.
Wir waren mit zwei kleinen Kindern vor Ort und es war hervorragend. Tagestouren kosten natÃ¼rlich extra. Hoang hilft bei jedem Anliegen und zwar schnell.
Mobilnetz: Wir hatten mit Vietnamobile keinen Empfang im Haus. Es gibt aber WiFi.

Hoang was a great host she provided transportation from airport and arranged for my motorbike rental ahead of time. I just had to show up! Very clean and quiet beach house with terrific waterfront to yourself. Highly recommend this place if you want to get away from tourists and still be a short drive to populated areas. Thanks again Hoang!

We had 5 awesome days in the Guest house. Everything was Clean and Hoang was always available if we had any question. What was also nice that the Transfer (Taxi) from the ferry was included :)
The house is a little bit far away from the City however with a rented Scooter Everything can be reached easily. There is also a Resort near the Guest house where we could easily book Tours or also Rent a Scooter.

We had an amazing time in this AirBNB. Especially the private beach is great for sunrise! Hoang is very sweet, made sure we had everything we needed and helped us with things like booking a taxi. Definately recommand staying here!

This is a real gem!
The house is very clean and has all the amenities (WiFi, AC). It is in a beautiful, quiet location - motorcycle rental is essential.
Thereâ€™s a little private beach, which is an amazing thing - enjoying your morning coffee during the sunrise (or a cold one during the sunset) here is an unforgettable experience on its
If youâ€™re looking for a very comfortable and quiet place to stay in Phu Quoc while being able to get in touch with the local community - then I doubt you can find anything better than this place.
Hoang is a great host, very communicative, friendly and super helpful.
We really liked that she shared some tips on the area and helped organizing taxis and motorcycle rental and her responsiveness.
We really loved the attention to detail and all the extra finishing touches (such as cold drinks awaiting for our arrival).
We will back for sure!

It looks even better than on the photos! The host is incredible, she is very responsive and always available to help. We had a great stay; highly recommend.
The only thing that I think could be improved is the detail of the available services and their price; which are not clearly listed on the website. Make sure to ask the host for the details until they update the property's description.

It was an amazing stay. The accommodation has everything you need for an excellent price. The neighbourhood is quiet and away from the main street but itâ€™s still walkable and not far away from the night market. The host is really friendly and proactive.
We have nothing to complain about :D
Nice, comfortable and clean room near the center. Má»¹ was very helpful throughout the whole visit. Highly recommended.
Lovely host, very helpful and friendly.

We stayed in this paradise for 2.5 weeks. It was wonderful. The area is very large, but there was no one there except us. Itâ€™s a very green place with a great view. We stayed alone in a bungalow, and it was very quiet and private. We often used the shared kitchen, which was convenient because we didnâ€™t need to go to a cafÃ© every day. Linh and her mom are very kind hosts; they were always available and helped us solve any issues we had. They also helped us rent a motorbike, which was very good, and we explored the entire island on it. It was very close to Khem Beach and Sao Beach; we got there in just 10 minutes. On the way, we passed by markets and shops where we bought food. We also went to King Kong in Duong Dong for food, which took about 35 minutes to get to. At our villa, there were also two wonderful and friendly dogs; we played with them every evening and became great friends. Thank you for making our stay on Phu Quoc the best!
Great

This will be our honest review of the two-story cabin :)
First of all, I want to thank Linh and her mom very much for their hospitality. They are very sweet and helpful hosts and we haven't met many like them in our last two yrs of traveling. They are just douchy)
I had the wrong number on Lazada but they helped with the delivery and took care of all the issues even though they were under no obligation.
Secondly, this lodge is really cozy and clean. There is everything you need for a comfortable stay for any period.
However, for a fair picture, I am obliged to warn subsequent renters.
